com.decoded.zool

Class HostAddress

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.decoded.zool.HostAddress

  • public class HostAddress
extends java.lang.Object
    This object parses a remote host url, a service map node, and a service key into an organized set of data about the host itself. Allowing quick access to things like hostUrl and port, or full url, or the service key of the host.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

      HostAddress(java.lang.String serviceMapNode, java.lang.String serviceKey, java.lang.String remoteHostUrl)
      Immutable Object to parse a host address and its related data.

      • HostAddress

                   java.lang.String serviceKey,
                   java.lang.String remoteHostUrl)
        Immutable Object to parse a host address and its related data.
        Parameters:
        serviceMapNode - the service map node name for your dynamic discovery service
        serviceKey - the service key
        remoteHostUrl - the remote host url.
